price: Dalagaa kee ishee dalagde (ajjeechaa raawwatte) san hin hojjannee? Ati gantoota irraahi” [jedhe].
arabic: وَفَعَلۡتَ فَعۡلَتَكَ ٱلَّتِي فَعَلۡتَ وَأَنتَ مِنَ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: wafaʿalta faʿlataka allatī faʿalta wa-anta mina al-kāfirīna
